title: From US Crits to Euro Classics: Riley Sheehan Turns Pro with Israel-Premier Tech
content:
Boulder native and Paris-Tour champ Sheehan switches Denver Disruptors for three years with IPT: 'I'm hungrier and more motivated.'

Read the full article at From US Crits to Euro Classics: Riley Sheehan Turns Pro with Israel-Premier Tech on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
